files.RootContext.tsx:
import {createContext} from "axii";

export const RootContext = createContext('root')

files.RouterContext.ts:
import {createContext} from "axii";

export const RouterContext = createContext('RouterContext')

files.ParallelActions.tsx:
import {RenderContext} from "axii"; import {Action} from 'data0-action' function wait(time: number) { return new Promise(resolve => { setTimeout(resolve, time) }) } export function ParallelActions({}, {createElement}:RenderContext) { const parallelAction = new Action(async (input:number) => { await wait(1000) return input+1 }, { parallelLimit: 3 }) const p1 = parallelAction.run(1) const p2 = parallelAction.run(2) const p3 = parallelAction.run(3) return

parallel action

name status data
p1 {p1.status} {p1.data}
p2 {p2.status} {p2.data}
p3 {p3.status} {p3.data}
}

files.SingleActions.tsx:
import {RenderContext} from "axii"; import {SingleAction} from 'data0-action' function wait(time: number) { return new Promise(resolve => { setTimeout(resolve, time) }) } export function SingleActions({}, {createElement}:RenderContext) { const parallelAction = new SingleAction(async (input:number) => { await wait(2000) return input+1 }) const p1 = parallelAction.run(1) const p2 = parallelAction.run(2) const p3 = parallelAction.run(3) return
